languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт удивленно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я говорила с душами предков Алайтока. Помню яркое свечение и сотни внимательных взглядов, пронзающих мою душу. А потом... не помню ничего. Я просто очнулась, мон-кай".

{n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт удивленно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я говорила с душами предков Алайтока. Помню яркое свечение и сотни внимательных взглядов, пронзающих мою душу. А потом... не помню ничего. Я просто очнулась, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders in surprise.{/n} "I had been speaking with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and the hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I don't remember anything. I just came to, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs her shoulders in surprise.{/n} "I had been speaking with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and the hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I don't remember anything. I just came to, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特耸了耸肩，露出惊讶的表情。{/n}“我和阿莱托克先祖的灵魂谈过了，我记得看到耀眼的光芒，还有无数道探究的目光穿过我的灵魂。然后……然后我就什么也不记得了，再然后我就醒了。仅此而已，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特耸了耸肩，露出惊讶的表情。{/n}“我和阿莱托克先祖的灵魂谈过了，我记得看到耀眼的光芒，还有无数道探究的目光穿过我的灵魂。然后……然后我就什么也不记得了，再然后我就醒了。仅此而已，猴子。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se encoge de hombros, con aspecto sorprendido.{/n} «He hablado con las almas de los ancestros de Alaitoc. Recuerdo un intenso fulgor y centenares de miradas penetrantes clavándose en mi alma. Y después... ya no recuerdo nada. Me desperté sin más, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se encoge de hombros, con aspecto sorprendido.{/n} «He hablado con las almas de los ancestros de Alaitoc. Recuerdo un intenso fulgor y centenares de miradas penetrantes clavándose en mi alma. Y después... ya no recuerdo nada. Me desperté sin más, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Surprise, Yrliet hausse les épaules.{/n} « J'ai parlé avec les âmes des ancêtres d'Alaitoc. Je me souviens d'une aura lumineuse et de centaines de regards qui transperçaient mon âme. Et ensuite... il n'y a plus rien. Je me suis simplement réveillée, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Surprise, Yrliet hausse les épaules.{/n} « J'ai parlé avec les âmes des ancêtres d'Alaitoc. Je me souviens d'une aura lumineuse et de centaines de regards qui transperçaient mon âme. Et ensuite... il n'y a plus rien. Je me suis simplement réveillée, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet zuckt mit den Schultern und wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Ich habe mit den Seelen von Alaitocs Ahnen gesprochen. Ich erinnere mich an ein helles Leuchten und Hunderte beobachtender Blicke, die meine Seele durchbohrten. Und dann ... erinnere ich mich an nichts mehr. Ich bin einfach aufgewacht, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet zuckt mit den Schultern und wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Ich habe mit den Seelen von Alaitocs Ahnen gesprochen. Ich erinnere mich an ein helles Leuchten und Hunderte beobachtender Blicke, die meine Seele durchbohrten. Und dann ... erinnere ich mich an nichts mehr. Ich bin einfach aufgewacht, Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは驚いたように肩をすくめる。{/n}「我はアレイトックの父祖の魂と会話をした。明るい光と何百もの観察の視線が我の魂に突き刺さったのを覚えている。それから…何も思い出せない。ただ目が覚めただけだ、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは驚いたように肩をすくめる。{/n}「我はアレイトックの父祖の魂と会話をした。明るい光と何百もの観察の視線が我の魂に突き刺さったのを覚えている。それから…何も思い出せない。ただ目が覚めただけだ、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Şaşırmış görünen Yrliet, omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Alaitoc'lu ataların ruhlarıyla konuştum. Işıyan bir parlaklık gördüğümü ve yüzlerce dikkatli gözün ruhumu deldiğini hatırlıyorum. Sonra... Başka bir şey hatırlamıyorum, öylece uyandım mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs, looking surprised.{/n} "I spoke with the souls of Alaitoc's ancestors. I remember a bright glow and hundreds of observant gazes piercing my soul. And then... I do not remember anything. I just woke up, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, şaşırmış gibi gözükerek omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Alaitoc atalarının ruhlarıyla konuştum. Işıyan bir parlaklık gördüğümü ve yüzlerce dikkatli gözün ruhumu deldiğini hatırlıyorum. Sonra... Başka bir şey hatırlamıyorum, ardından uyandım mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
